metadata.title: YLY - Youth Leading Youth
metadata.description: Youth Leading Youth (YLY) - Empowering the next generation of leaders through education, community engagement, and innovative youth development programs.

hero.title: Youth Leading Youth
hero.subtitle: Empowering the Next Generation
hero.description: Building tomorrow's leaders today through youth empowerment and community engagement

about.title: Who We Are?
about.description: We are the volunteers of the Ministry of Youth and Sports YLY A project launched by the Minister of Youth and Sports Dr. Ashraf Sobhi under the name (Youth Managing Youth) since he assumed the position of Minister of Youth and Sports in 2018
about.description2: The project is spread across the governorates of the Republic and includes a large number of young people in

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Our project aims to expand youth participation and empower the next generation of leaders through structured engagement and development programs.

objectives.promote: Promote and organize Ministry's activities effectively
objectives.prepare: Prepare youth for the modern labor market
objectives.establish: Establish sports as an integral lifestyle component

reach.title: Our Reach:
reach.description: Operating across multiple governorates, we engage youth through 7 specialized committees:

governments.title: We Are Present In All Governorates
governments.description: Explore our presence across Egypt's diverse regions.

board.title: YLY Board
board.description: Meet our dedicated board members who lead YLY's mission

timeline.title: Objectives of the YLY Volunteers Project

1.title: Vision 1
1.description: Benefiting the largest number of young people from all governorates

2.title: Vision 2
2.description: Developing personal and functional skills for young people

3.title: Vision 3
3.description: Preparing young people for the labor market

4.title: Vision 4
4.description: Participate in organizing all Ministry and directorate events

5.title: Vision 5
5.description: Producing young people into society who are able to bear responsibilities

6.title: Vision 6
6.description: Serving the community and maintaining its duties

grid.title: Stay with us moment by moment

newsletter.title: Subscribe to Our Newsletter
newsletter.description: Stay updated with our latest news and updates

tech-partnership.title: YLY Partners with Global Tech Giants for Youth Employment
tech-partnership.description: Major technology companies join forces with YLY to create job opportunities and internships for Egyptian youth in the tech sector.

content.intro: YLY has secured groundbreaking partnerships with several international technology companies to boost employment opportunities for Egyptian youth in the rapidly growing tech sector.

highlights.title: Partnership Highlights
items: 500+ internship positions across various tech companies
Specialized training programs in software development
Remote work opportunities with global teams

training.title: Training Programs
training.intro: Participants will receive comprehensive training in:

environmental.title: YLY Environmental Leadership Program Makes Waves
environmental.description: Youth-led environmental initiatives show remarkable success in first quarter, with over 50 community projects launched across Egypt.

upcoming.title: Upcoming Initiatives
upcoming.intro: The program is set to expand with new projects focusing on:

arts-festival.title: YLY Arts and Culture Festival Showcases Young Talent
arts-festival.description: Annual festival brings together young artists, musicians, and performers from across Egypt in a celebration of creativity and cultural expression.

impact.title: Impact on Young Artists
impact.intro: The festival has created numerous opportunities for young artists:
items: Gallery partnerships for emerging visual artists

womens-sports.title: YLY Launches Revolutionary Women's Sports Initiative
womens-sports.description: YLY introduces a groundbreaking initiative to promote women's participation in sports across Egypt, targeting universities and youth centers.

content.intro: In a landmark move towards gender equality in sports, YLY has launched its highly anticipated Women's Sports Initiative.

components.title: Key Program Components
items: Partnership with major universities and sports facilities
Professional training programs led by experienced coaches
Mentorship opportunities with established female athletes

impact.title: Community Impact
impact.description: Beyond individual development, the program aims to create lasting change in how women's sports are perceived and supported in Egypt.

whyChooseCommittee.label: Why did you choose this committee?

whereKnowAboutUs.label: How did you hear about us?

metadata.title: YLY Across Egypt - Youth Leading Youth | All 27 Governorates
metadata.description: Discover how Youth Leading Youth (YLY) empowers communities across all 27 Egyptian governorates. Join 10,000+ volunteers making a difference through the Ministry of Youth and Sports.

hero.title: YLY Across Egypt
hero.subtitle: Youth Leading Youth in all 27 governorates, empowering communities through the Ministry of Youth and Sports

mapSection.title: YLY in Egypt's Governorates
mapSection.subtitle: Discover how YLY empowers youth and serves communities across all 27 governorates in Egypt
mapSection.noResults: No governorates found matching your search.

features.title: YLY's Impact Across Egypt
features.subtitle: Through our 7 specialized committees - HR, Social Media, PR, Operations, R&D, Media, and Training - YLY empowers youth across all 27 governorates to become leaders and change-makers in their communities.

youthEmpowerment.title: Youth Empowerment
youthEmpowerment.description: Training programs and skill development workshops for young people across all 27 governorates through our specialized committees.

leadershipDevelopment.title: Leadership Development
leadershipDevelopment.description: Building tomorrow's leaders through structured leadership programs, mentoring, and hands-on experience in governance.

communityService.title: Community Service
communityService.description: Organizing community projects, environmental initiatives, and social impact programs in partnership with local governorates.

eventOrganization.title: Event Organization
eventOrganization.description: Coordinating and managing Ministry events, sports activities, and cultural programs across Egypt's regions.

digitalInnovation.title: Digital Innovation
digitalInnovation.description: Leveraging social media, technology, and digital platforms to connect youth and amplify YLY's reach nationwide.

laborMarketPreparation.title: Labor Market Preparation
laborMarketPreparation.description: Equipping youth with professional skills, training, and opportunities to succeed in the modern workforce.

cta.title: Join YLY Today!
cta.description: Become part of the largest youth movement in Egypt. Explore opportunities in your governorate and start making a difference in your community through YLY.
